long_description: The Electra Comfort handlebar grips use shock-absorbing rubber to deliver cushy comfort for your hands and wrists, letting you focus on your ride, not your cramped hands. Grips feature soft, shock-absorbing rubber sections to increase comfort. Fits straight-end handlebars with ends that are 26.2mm in diameter. Grips can be used on handlebars that have trigger shifters; can also be used on handlebars with grip shifters if the grip shifter is moved over on the handlebar.
short_description: The Electra Comfort handlebar grips use shock-absorbing rubber to deliver cushy comfort for your hands and wrists, letting you focus on your ride, not your cramped hands.
